vendor_name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Nani Venice
title: Five-Star Venice Elegance on the Cannaregio Canal with Daily Breakfast
description:
Among the ornate architecture and gliding gondolas of Italy’s most romantic city, you'll find the Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Nani Venice, a restored Renaissance palace occupying a coveted spot along the Cannaregio Canal. Velvet trim and rich 16th-century frescos glow against understated contemporary design. After days spent exploring the shops and cafes that line the weaving waterways, you'll enjoy retreating to this stately space that oozes both historic charm and modern sophistication.

Be romanced by traditional cicchetti nibbles and gourmet pizzas at ZOJA Wine Bar & Terrace, named after the original noble residents of the Palazzo Nani, or let the Lounge Bar craft your evening cocktail. Set out in a private gondola, or escape the crowds with a vaporetto ride to Murano Island, where Romanesque buildings colour the tangled alleyways.
location_description: Radisson Collection Hotel, Palazzo Nani Venice

title: Historic Venice Canal Stay
description: Lose yourself in charming Venice and sleep by the world-famous canal at Salute Palace Hotel. The historic Venetian building sits in one of the most premium locations in The Floating City, with its very own water landing for gondolas and water taxis. Enjoy a four, five or seven-night stay with daily continental buffet breakfast, a delicious dinner for two, a cocktail per person and a welcome glass of prosecco on arrival.

title: Venice 17th-Century Heritage Palazzo on the Grand Canal with Daily Breakfast & EUR50 Dining Credit
description:
Let the gilded glamour of this enchanting heritage Palazzo whisk you away to 17th-century Venice, set on the edge of the iconic Grand Canal. From the soaring bell tower of San Giorgio in the distance to the shimmering waters of the San Marco Basin beneath you, this ornate stay invites you to live the Venice of your dreams.

Dine beneath the Venetian sky and savour a gourmet Italian meal on the terrace at the Grand Canal Restaurant, where you can make the most of your EUR50 on a culinary delight of your choosing, or sip on a Bellini at the bar while the gondolas drift by. Inside, the rich history of the Ridotto lingers in every elegant corner, blending centuries-old charm with modern refinement.
offer_address: P.za San Marco, 1332/1238 Venezia, Venice 30100, Italy

title: Venice's Only Beach Resort: Heritage Lido di Venezia Glamour with Daily Breakfast & EUR100 Credit
description:
Located on a private beachfront on the Lido di Venezia, this landmark hotel is unlike any other in Venice. Since its lavish grand opening in 1908, this five-star hotel has been a favoured retreat for the world’s most renowned figures. Adding to its legendary status, it has proudly hosted the Venice Film Festival since its inception in 1932.

Spend your days soaking up the sun at the private beach or indulging in spritzes and carpaccio at one of the hotel’s three stylish restaurants and bars. Refresh with a dip in the sparkling pool, overlooking the Adriatic Sea, or unwind with a therapeutic massage in the comfort of your dreamy guestroom. When the allure of The Floating City calls, hop aboard an elegant oak shuttle boat and glide to the Piazza San Marco in just 15 minutes.
offer_address: Lungomare Guglielmo Marconi, 41, Lido, Venice 30126, Italy

title: Venice's Only Beach Resort: Heritage Lido di Venezia Glamour with Breakfast & Free San Marco Shuttle
description:
Located on a private beachfront on the Lido di Venezia, this landmark hotel is unlike any other in Venice. Since its lavish grand opening in 1908, this hotel has been a favoured retreat for the world’s most renowned figures. Adding to its legendary status, it has proudly hosted the Venice Film Festival since its inception in 1932.

Spend your days soaking up the sun at the beach club or indulging in spritzes and carpaccio at one of the hotel’s three stylish restaurants and bars. When the allure of The Floating City calls, hop aboard an elegant oak shuttle and glide to the Piazza San Marco in just 15 minutes.
offer_address: Lungomare Guglielmo Marconi, 41, Lido, Venice 30126, Italy

title: Venice 18th-Century Palazzo Opulence Overlooking the Grand Canal with Daily Breakfast & Roof Terrace
description:
For a glittering escape, look no further than Palazzo Barocci, one of the exclusive crown jewels lining Venice's Grand Canal. With history dating back to the 1300s as both a grand residence and premium concert hall hosting the likes of Vivaldi and Goldoni, today the hotel invites guests to become part of the enchanting story.

Besides boasting a charming garden, perfect for quiet moments of reflection, as well as an exclusive lounge that offers a sophisticated space to unwind, the hotel's real showstopper is the roof terrace. Here, guests can savour aperitivos while drinking in views of the comings and goings of the bustling Grand Canal.

There's no better way to discover the floating city than from a location like this. Find yourself walking distance to St. Mark's Square, the iconic Rialto Bridge and countless other charming streets and smaller canals begging to be explored.
offer_address: Corte de l'Albero 3878/A, San Marco, Venice 30124, Italy

title: History Meets Glamour on Venice’s Picturesque Grand Canal
description: Lose yourself in the picturesque streets of Venice and sleep by the world-famous Grand Canal at H10 Palazzo Canova. Housed in a perfectly restored 19th-century palazzo, the hotel sits in one of the most premium locations in The Floating City, steps away from the world-famous Rialto Bridge. Discover the magic of Venice as you enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival and a flute of prosecco at the rooftop bar, offering views of this breathtaking historic labyrinth of canals.
offer_address: Riva del Vin, 744, 30125 Venezia VE, Italy

title: History Meets Glamour on Venice’s Picturesque Grand Canal
description: Lose yourself in the water wonderland of Venice and sleep by the world-famous Grand Canal at H10 Palazzo Canova. Housed in a perfectly restored 19th-century palazzo, the hotel sits in one of the most premium locations in The Floating City, steps away from the world-famous Rialto Bridge. Discover the magic of Venice as you enjoy daily breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, a glass of prosecco at the rooftop bar and a 15% discount on food and drinks.
offer_address: Riva del Vin, 744, 30125 Venezia VE, Italy

vendor_name: San Clemente Palace (previously known as San Clemente Palace Kempinski Venice)
title: Venice Five-Star Private Island Retreat on Secluded San Clemente
description:
If you’re looking for the ultimate Italian sanctuary, the secluded San Clemente Palace has it all. Nestled on the private island of San Clemente, this five-star hotel boasts stunning vistas of the surrounding lagoon and the Piazza San Marco alongside oustanding facilities like a heated outdoor pool and luxurious spa.

Indulge in modern Venetian and Italian dishes at Acquerello Restaurant or try a neo-Asian gastronomic experience at the poolside Buddha Bar Beach Restaurant. Venture out by complimentary boat service to explore historic Venice and its many cultural destinations and shopping opportunities, before heading back to enjoy the magnificent hospitality throughout your stay.
offer_address: Isola di San Clemente 1, 30124 Venice, Italy

title: Boutique Venice Waterfront Palace Stay
description:
Immerse yourself in the heritage and grandeur of Italy's floating city with a stay at Venice's stylishly sophisticated Il Palazzo Experimental, a converted Renaissance-era palace nestled on the northern edge of the Giudecca Canal. The boutique hotel balances the best of the famous canal city: hidden away from the hustle and bustle of the tourist-filled laneways and yet within easy reach of iconic attractions, including St Mark’s Basilica and Accademia Gallery. Surrounded by famously good restaurants and bars, and within easy walking distance of two vaporetto stops, it’s perfectly positioned for days spent eating and exploring.

French designer Dorothée Meilichzon transformed the Il Palazzo Experimental into a seaside haven, introducing an Art Deco sophistication while maintaining the exposed beams and Gothic windows of the original palace. Ascend to the signature city-view cocktail bar to watch vaporettos buzz up and down the Giudecca Canal and perhaps savour a cicchetti or two with an aperitivo, summon a gondola to the palazzo's private pier or sequester yourself in the hotel's breathtaking garden, where you’ll have a front-row seat to all the locals’ comings and goings. Delve into the tastes of southern Italy with an evening in Ristorante Adriatica or settle in for cocktails at the Experimental Cocktail Club, where expert bartenders will shake or stir anything you fancy.
offer_address: Fondamenta Zattere Al Ponte Lungo, 1411, 30123 Venezia VE, Italy

title: Boutique Venice Palazzo Luxury Overlooking the Priuli Canal
description:
The mesmerising beauty and spectacular architecture of Venice are yours to explore - by foot or gondola - from the prestigious Maison Venezia | UNA Esperienze. Housed in a perfectly restored Venetian gothic palazzo with views over the Priuli Canal, the hotel pays tribute to the legacy of the building's past through its artistic design and beautifully furnished interiors. Each of its 28 picturesque rooms exudes traditional grandeur with contemporary grace, set off by magnificent Murano glass chandeliers.

Nestled in the Cannaregio district, one of the most historical locations in the Floating City, Maison Venezia | UNA Esperienze offers an ideal mix of ancient elegance and modern comforts; all the while maintaining traditional Italian hospitality and authentic 'stile Veneziano'. Guests can enjoy 'squisito servizio Italiano' (exquisite Italian services) at the refined, light-filled Café UNA, which hosts a complimentary buffet every evening, tempting guests with homemade Venetian-style sandwiches and sparkling wine. Once you've had your fill, hit the city streets and explore iconic sites such as St. Mark's Square, Doge's Palace, the Grand Canal and Rialto Bridge.
offer_address: Ruga do Pozzi, 4173, 30121 Venezia VE, Italy

title: Elegant Five-Star Venice Escape Overlooking St. Mark's Square & San Giorgio Maggiore Island
description: Get swept away in a world of Italian elegance at the five-star Baglioni Hotel Luna Venice, a prestigious waterfront abode overflowing with aristocratic ambience, just moments from St. Mark's Square. Part of the Luxury Hotels of the World collection, and home to luxurious rooms and suites adorned in antique furnishings and Venetian style, this renovated retreat invites you on a timeless journey through art, history and gastronomical delights. Stay in one of the most sought-after parts of Venice, just moments from St. Mark's Square and the Bridge of Sighs. Spend days navigating alleys and indulging in Italian cuisine or elevate romance on a private gondola ride through the breathtaking canal network.

title: Romantic Venice Riverside Escape near Piazza San Marco with Two Restaurants & Spa
description:
Experience ultimate elegance at this timeless five-star jewel in the heart of Italy's floating city. This historic palazzo-turned-hotel offers a serene escape amidst the city's winding canals and cobblestone streets. Savour Venetian cuisine at one of two onsite restaurants, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the sophisticated Alchemia Bar with panoramic views of the lagoon.

When you're ready to explore, find yourself within easy reach of the iconic Piazza San Marco, Doge's Palace, the Rialto Bridge, and other city attractions. Call it a day in the cosy reading hall with a book, or head to the spa for a refreshing massage that re-energises you for more exploring. The immaculate courtyards are perfect for strolling and enjoying the soft breeze.
offer_address: Riva Ca' di Dio, 2183, Venice 30122, Italy

title: Top-Rated Heritage Glamour on Venice’s Grand Canal with Water-View Rooftop Bar
description:
Rest your head by Venice’s iconic Grand Canal and Rialto Bridge at H10 Palazzo Canova, winner of a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2020. Occupying a 19th-century palace, lovingly restored to its former glory, this canalside hotel is a celebration of Venice past and present, with Murano glass accents, Venetian fabrics and a terrace bar that boasts spectacular water views. Step outside to cross Rialto Bridge, explore St. Mark’s Square and Doge's Palace or simply lose yourself in the laneways, museums and palazzi of the world’s most famous floating city.

Elegant rooms balance the original elements of the antique palazzo with contemporary touches and luxurious amenities, such as plush beds, espresso machines and a pillow menu. Make sure you’re ready for a day of exploring with a full breakfast in the onsite restaurant, before returning for a drink at La Terrazza, H10 Palazzo Canova’s rooftop bar. With panoramic views of the Grand Canal, there’s no better spot to take in all that Venice has to offer, spritz and cicchetti in hand.
offer_address: Riva del Vin, 744, 30125 Venezia VE, Italy

title: Venice Refined Retreat near the Floating City
description: On the outskirts of Venice, the voco Venice Mestre - The Quid, an IHG Hotel, is a refined retreat perfect for romantic day trips into the floating city. Keep active at the fitness centre or enjoy seasonal fare and an extensive wine list at the Ludico Venice restaurant before sightseeing in one of Italy's most picturesque cities. After a memorable day exploring Renaissance architecture, imposing palaces, cathedrals and calming canals, return to rest and relax in a stylish and sophisticated room.
location_description: voco Venice Mestre - The Quid, an IHG Hotel

title: Venice Indulgence with Tranquil Inner Garden & Onsite Venetian Restaurant
description: Get lost in the labyrinth of Venice's twisting alleyways and gondola-filled canals before retreating to Hotel Indigo Venice - Sant'Elena, an IHG Hotel for a moment of luxury between explorations. This converted 1930s monastery is now a tranquil escape with a serene inner garden area (perfect to enjoy a negroni or bellini), while the Savor Restaurant and Bar celebrates Venetian cuisine by serving an exquisite menu of seafood and handmade pasta, alongside an extensive list of curated fine wines.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Venice - Sant'Elena, an IHG Hotel
